queries.query: Create a world with 10 islands, each with a unique biome and terrain type. Include mountains, rivers, and forests.
Generate a world with 5 continents, each with its own climate and geography. Include deserts, tundras, and jungles.
Design a world with a central ocean and several archipelagos. Include underwater features like trenches and reefs.
Create a world with a single supercontinent surrounded by a vast ocean. Include diverse ecosystems and climates.
Generate a world with a polar region and a tropical region. Include unique flora and fauna for each zone.
Design a world with a large mountain range and several valleys. Include rivers that flow from the mountains to the sea.
Create a world with a volcanic island and surrounding coral reefs. Include unique geological features and ecosystems.
Generate a world with a series of plateaus and canyons. Include unique rock formations and desert landscapes.
Design a world with a large lake and several rivers flowing into it. Include wetlands and marshes around the lake.
Create a world with a series of islands. Include unique cultures and civilizations on each island.
